title: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mohuan Shikong
title_japanese: 阿法贝乐园之魔幻时空
synopsis: The little boy Kiki is naughty, enthusiastic, and kind, and one day he met the potato chip wizard "click" while playing in the park. Kiki helped Kaka complete the task of the elf, and in return, Kaka took Kiki to Alfabe Paradise. The magic giant Alfabe is the master of Alfabe Paradise and the teacher of the children. And Qiqi's classmates turned out to be elves with 26 letters. Alfabe can fly and there are many incredible magics, so everything becomes lively and interesting. In Alfabe’s magic classroom, English learning is integrated into stories, games and music, and children can realize many lovely wishes. Unconsciously, Kiki fell in love with English learning. (translated from youku)

Sequel.name: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mofa Xiaoxuesheng
